name: Bodega Cat Simulator
description:
Experience the life of a New York City deli cat in five-second increments! This game was made in a week for Replay Game Jam. 

How to play:

  • Each microgame is completely different and only lasts five seconds
  • Use arrow keys and/or spacebar to control
  • Yes it's basically warioware

This game is open source! MIT-licensed code on github.
